name: nsrdude
text: A comment left by nsrdude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stormypinkness, Overmedicated, CanusDivinus, superninjabeast, betwixt, Wolfslice, yaegmenthor, Dallovich)

name: diggidy
text:
You are astonishingly mistaken.
The depressed cat dies many times.

name: centipede_damascus
text: What does a shirt that says "lifestyle" represent?

name: sargasm
text: It's probably a plug for that band Lifestyle which is in the Radio Achewood section.

name: honesttom
text: I was hoping that Teador was actually promoting the concept of having a lifestyle. It would be a Positive Thing.

text: Gotta start trying harder.

text: IS HE DEFINITELY GOING TO DIE?

text:
DEFINITELY OR ONLY MAYBE?
TUNE IN TOMORROW FOR THE SHOCKING REVELATION

name: achewoodno1fan
text: A comment left by achewoodno1fan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, straw, nighttoad, FVVS, twentyfivepast, heccibiggs, Overmedicated, Projectyl, NeoNaoNeo, glorify, Jesler729, Deusoma, TerribleRobot, mashisoyo, kazad, rowboat, anticitizen, equinn2006, hellsfruition, Gumfish, Sargasm, DougTheHead, meowmix, Firehawk, Baryonyx, idsyen, Hyetal, nutmeg, Hexjumper, Boredom_Man, betwixt, nathanielperson, Mastronaut, Appers, morbo)

name: nighttoad
text:
wait...

what did you just say? i can't even comprehend it.

name: nighttoad
text: and of course, by "just" i meant three months ago.

name: rotating-dog
text: Is it me, or does Ray sound like Arthur from support group in this one?

name: cdl146
text: Alt text: www.lifestyleland.com - like duran duran but without the limos

name: greenkoolayd
text: thier shimmery gloomy dance-y "emotions"-rock is rather pleasant to listen to.

name: dedalusdedalus
text: A comment left by dedalusdedalus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TTAGXAMM, ElZilcho, slalvation)

name: stuart
text: This is Major Beef to Ground Control: I'm stepping through the door

name: tekende
text: and uh i'm floating in the most dang peculiar way

name: dougthehead
text: Your avatar really sells that comment.

name: puguglypress
text: planet earth is blue and there's nothing i can do, such as help

name: astro_zombie
text: I love how much old-school Ray waved his arms around. I miss that.

name: coco
text: I also like Ray's elbows . . . very knobby!

name: f1shst1ck
text: Nothing like projecting, eh ray?

name: deathpiano
text: The way Ray explains it to Teodor makes it sound like they all expected this to be the logical progression - when Roast Beef cannot take it anymore, he will eventually fly into outer space.  Like it isn't so much the reaction that surprised them, as how soon it came.

name: nabeel84
text:
The stupid thing is it was more Ray's fault than Pat's fault.

I do love the "For shame pat!" line though.

name: wae
text: "LIFESTYLE"

name: baryonyx
text: hey guys I am also a fan of the classical music such as the likes of adagios and nocturnes

name: trollcollins
text: Arguing what a minuet was when in private from teachers? I still posit that it is a fake concept.

name: highpitch_83
text:
Beef is hella nervous in panel 1 and it only gets worse as he hits what little atmosphere the moon has in panel 2....

Help a brother out Pat!

name: mercuri0us
text: he's so nervous he's making the chair and the console shake.

name: landowmpg
text:
Panel 2 reminds me of Contact.

I'M OK TO GO

name: decostop
text:
Beef uses punctuation when nervous.

Or maybe so his words won't float out into space. Which is why I always prefer it.

name: steerpike66
text:
Ray has temporarily adopted the persona of a finger-pointing angel of recrimination, such as one might find standing on a bluff over-looking the sea in a Victorian novel.

Shame! Shame on you, and your children, and your children's children, Pat!

name: _cheesekayke
text: Man, panel 5 Teodor looks like he is totally preparing to remove his head, and it's sort of freaking me out.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: a chubby for truth.

name: solobuttons
text: I find Teodor and Ray's interactions hilarious in ths strip.

name: appers
text: I love how Ray thinks Beef is depressed basically just because Pat is sort of an asshole at this point.

name: sweetlips
text: I love Ray with my entire heart.
